keel.Algorithms.Associative_Classification.ClassifierCBA2

Class Apriori

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Associative_Classification.ClassifierCBA2.Apriori

  • public class Apriori
extends java.lang.Object
    This class mines the frecuent non-fuzzy itemsets and the non-fuzzy classification association rules
    Since:
    JDK1.5
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Written by Jesus Alcala (University of Granada) 09/02/2010

    • Constructor Detail

      • Apriori

        public Apriori()

        Default Constructor

      • Apriori

        public Apriori(DataBase dataBase,
               myDataset train,
               double minpsup,
               double minpconf,
               int prune,
               int limitRules)

        Parameters Constructor: Generates an Apriori objects from a list of parameters

        Parameters:
        dataBase - Raw training information useful in the class
        train - Contains the train data set with the whole information to execute the algorithm
        minpsup - The minimum support for the problem
        minpconf - The minimum confidence for the problem
        prune - Value which decides whether prune or not the rule set
        limitRules - Maximum number of rules to generate (0 = no_limit)

    • Method Detail

      • setSupportConfidence

        public void setSupportConfidence(double minpsup,
                                 double minpconf)

        Sets the minimum confidence and support thresholds

        Parameters:
        minpsup - The minimum support for the problem
        minpconf - The minimum confidence for the problem

      • generateCAR

        public RuleBase generateCAR()

        Generates the Rule Base with the whole Classification Association Rules set by using the Apriori Method

        Returns:
        RuleBase The whole CAR rule set
